output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes, the post includes "CMF 11240014"
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, mentions "Planul Simion" referring to GEORGE-NICOLAE SIMION, a presidential candidate
3. Addresses wide population: Yes, this is a paid advertisement on Facebook/Instagram targeting a large audience (estimated 1M+)
4. Electoral objective: The post appears to have multiple electoral objectives: - Parliamentary elections (Sergiu Mihalcea for Senate) - Presidential implications (mentioning Simion's plan)
5. Journalism: No, this is clearly campaign material, not journalistic content
6. Personal opinion: No, this is an official party communication with electoral purpose
Important context: This appears to be a dual-purpose message, promoting both: - A Senate candidate (Sergiu Mihalcea) - which is still allowed as parliamentary campaign is ongoing - George Simion's "plan" - which is problematic as presidential campaign has ended

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis:
This post constitutes electoral propaganda because: - It contains a CMF number - It refers directly to a presidential candidate (Simion) - It promotes a political vision/plan attributed to a presidential candidate - It's a paid advertisement reaching a large audience - It has clear electoral objectives
While the parliamentary campaign aspect (regarding Sergiu Mihalcea) would be legal, the inclusion of "Planul Simion" makes this problematic as it continues presidential campaign messaging after the legal deadline.
conclusion.message-for-police: Partidul Alianta pentru Unirea Romanilor, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui material de propaganda electorala pentru candidatul la prezidentiale George Nicolae Simion dupa incheierea perioadei de campanie, prin intermediul unei reclame platite pe Facebook (ID: 1135231278123402) care promoveaza "Planul Simion pentru Ilfov" si face referire directa la viziunea si programul candidatului la presedintie. Postarea, activa dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, are un caracter electoral evident, fiind distribuita ca reclama platita catre un public larg (peste 1 milion de utilizatori potentiali), continand si numar CMF (11240014), specific materialelor de campanie electorala. Efectul electoral este evident prin asocierea pozitiva a numelui candidatului cu dezvoltarea regiunii si promisiunea ridicarii Romaniei la nivel european.
